head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths COHN, STELLA KATZ

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths COHN, STELLA KATZ

block.p: COHN--Stella Katz, 96, beloved widow of Sol Katz and dearest wife of the late Joseph Cohn, devoted mother of Isadora, Weiss and Rose Ortiz, adored grandmother of Wendy, Debby, David, Francisco and Diego, and greatgrandmother to Joshua, Gregory, Erica, Andrew, Amanda, Adam and Alex. She was sincerely caring and deeply generous. A woman of grace and intelligence, she stood out as a venerated leader of her community. We will forever miss your guidance and never forget your love.

COHN--Stella Katz, 96, beloved widow of Sol Katz and dearest wife of the late Joseph Cohn, devoted mother of Isadora, Weiss and Rose Ortiz, adored grandmother of Wendy, Debby, David, Francisco and Diego, and greatgrandmother to Joshua, Gregory, Erica, Andrew, Amanda, Adam and Alex. She was sincerely caring and deeply generous. A woman of grace and intelligence, she stood out as a venerated leader of her community. We will forever miss your guidance and never forget your love.
